thread.title: Harry Potter and Game of Thrones actors that will make you look twice (20 Photos)
thread.title_full: Harry Potter and Game of Thrones actors that will make you look twice (20 Photos)

author: Kayla
title: Harry Potter and Game of Thrones actors that will make you look twice (20 Photos)
text:
Advertisement 11 
Aberforth Dumbledore (Albus’ brother) is shown in the final installment of Harry Potter. Actor Ciarán Hinds is also Mance Rayder, the King Beyond the Wall in Game of Thrones. 12 HBO 13 
Actor Nicholas Blane (the wizard holding the box) had a little screen time in “Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix.” On Game of Thrones he’s Spice King, one of The Thirteen who rule Qarth. 14 HBO 15 
Sally Mortemore played the Hogwarts librarian in “Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.” She had a small role on “GOT” as a Braavosi woman in the sixth season. Advertisement
